named-query.name: ConcursoMegaSena.findSenas
named-query.query: select s from ConcursoMegaSena s where s.id in ( select sena.id from ConcursoMegaSena sena where sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.primeira = :primeira and sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.segunda = :segunda and sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.terceira = :terceira and sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quarta = :quarta and sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quinta = :quinta and sena.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :sexta )

named-query.name: ConcursoMegaSena.findQuinas
named-query.query: select q from ConcursoMegaSena q where q.id in ( select quina.id from ConcursoMegaSena quina where quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.primeira = :primeira and ( quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quinta = :quinta or quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quinta = :sexta or quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :quinta or quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :sexta ) ) or q.id in ( select quina.id from ConcursoMegaSena quina where quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.segunda = :primeira and ( quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quinta = :sexta or quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :sexta ) ) or q.id in ( select quina.id from ConcursoMegaSena quina where quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.primeira = :segunda and ( quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :sexta or quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :quinta ) ) or q.id in ( select quina.id from ConcursoMegaSena quina where quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.segunda = :segunda and quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.terceira = :terceira and quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quarta = :quarta and quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.quinta = :quinta and quina.dezenasMegaSenaOrdenadas.sexta = :sexta )

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.prDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.prDezena) as count, d.prDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.prDezena) order by d.prDezena

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.seDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.seDezena) as count, d.seDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.seDezena) order by d.seDezena

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.teDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.teDezena) as count, d.teDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.teDezena) order by d.teDezena

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.qaDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.qaDezena) as count, d.qaDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.qaDezena) order by d.qaDezena

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.qiDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.qiDezena) as count, d.qiDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.qiDezena) order by d.qiDezena

named-query.name: CounterPosicao.sxDezena
named-query.query: select count(d.sxDezena) as count, d.sxDezena as dezena from ConcursoMegaSena d group by (d.sxDezena) order by d.sxDezena
